title: ESS怎么禁用玩家权限
author: wojiaocrazy
txt_content: 让玩家不能使用 sethome home tpa tpaccept tpahere spawn suicide hat Nick 这些指令

replies.author: cafe_X
replies.txt_content:
一般玩家权限组默认是builder
可以输入：/mangaddp builder -essentials.sethome
/mangaddp builder -essentials.home
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpa
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpaccept
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpahere
/mangaddp builder -essentials.spawn
/mangaddp builder -essentials.suicide
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat
/mangaddp builder -essentials.nick
来达到你需要的目的

replies.author: jin7568866
replies.txt_content: 在GM权限组插件的配置文件里删除你所要删除的 指令

replies.author: wojiaocrazy
replies.txt_content:
cafe_X 发表于 2015-3-31 23:44
一般玩家权限组默认是builder
可以输入：/mangaddp builder -essentials.sethome
/mangaddp builder -essen ...
thanks 解决了
